title: Every child a winner!
creator_credit: Charles F. Holbrook and American Alliance for Health, Physical Education, and Recreation
brief_description: Presents a case history of a program which demonstrates the values of individualised movement-based physical education, the Project Health and Optimum Physical Education program. Demonstrates the results of the program which concentrates on children at the elementary grade level. For teacher training.
creator_credit_for_label: Charles F. Holbrook and American Alliance for Health, Physical Education, and Recreation
